thread.title: Janet Jackson’s Ex Mother-in-Law Claims She Has Proof of a Secret Daughter
thread.title_full: Janet Jackson’s Ex Mother-in-Law Claims She Has Proof of a Secret Daughter

author: Ariana Romero
title: Janet Jackson’s Ex Mother-in-Law Claims She Has Proof of a Secret Daughter
text:
February 23, 2017 by Ariana Romero 0 Shares Advertisement 
Those rumors about Janet Jackson ’s so-called “ secret daughter ” are back, and they’re coming from a brand new source. 
This time, Janet’s former mother-in-law is claiming the superstar, 50, gave birth to a baby girl 31 years ago. Credit: Inside Edition on YouTube 
Etterlene DeBarge, the mother of Janet’s musician first husband, James DeBarge, says she remembers speaking with a very pregnant Miss Jackson three decades ago, years before the performer gave birth to new baby boy Eissa . 
The “Rhythm Nation” singer’s 1980s comments on a possible pregnancy were shocking. 
"I told her she was pregnant; I didn't ask her," Etterlene tells Inside Edition of the star. 
"I said, 'Girl, you pregnant. Look how fat you're getting.'” 
While any woman not expecting a baby would be insulted by that statement, Janet had a very different reaction. Embed from Getty Images 
“She just laughed it off. She never denied it," the DeBarge mom reveals. 
Etterlene has been searching for her possible granddaughter since that awkward encounter and may have finally found her. 
The would-be celebrity grandma says she’s been contacted by countless women claiming to be Janet’s secret baby and one finally seems plausible. 
The evidence is pretty undeniable. 
"I told her, 'The proof is in the pudding. Let's go get a DNA test,'" Etterlene says of someone claiming to be Janet’s daughter, whom she now has photos with. 
The proof was definitely there once the results arrived. 
The “probability of relatedness” between Etterlene and the unnamed 31-year-old Philadelphia woman is a whopping 96.7 percent. 
Still, this apparent proof of relatedness leaves one big question open. 
Is the mysterious Philadelphian Janet ’s daughter? 
The DNA may prove a link to Etterlene and Janet’s ex-husband, but proves nothing about the identity of the mother. 
Do you believe Janet’s daughter has finally been uncovered? Tell us in the comments section!
